data.title: Here's Why PayPal, Visa, Discover, American Express, and Mastercard Are Plunging on Monday
data.text: The payment processors are having a pretty rough start to the week.

data.title: Can Mastercard Stock Recover Its Lost Value Post The Coronavirus Crisis?
data.text: Mastercard (NYSE: MA) stock could bounce back strongly and potentially outperform the S&P 500 index as the crisis winds down, similar to the post 2008 crisis where it rose nearly 62% between March 2009 and January 2010, as compared to the 48% jump in the S&P index.
